data.message: Yo eminem im from the philipines men..ive been a fan of yours since i heard your song we made you and thats when i was maybe 5 or 6..you inspire the hell out of me and your music had been my therapy when shit happened on our family..in a way im like you cause my mom shows me that she hates me..tho my dad loved me..and ive been trying to write some rhymes and be like you slim..i love you and your work..try to drop by the philippines men its fucking cool here and ill do anything just to see you live :)  just suggesting men
